member.name: T:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1
member.summary: Provides caching and version control when persisting state changes on new, updated or removed documents using a decorated instance .

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.#ctor(Fursvp.Data.IRepository{`0},Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.IMemoryCache,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The instance of to decorate.
The instance of for deep copies.
The instance of for caching.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Permanently removes an existing document representing from the repository by exposing the decorated method, and from the cache.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the entity.
member.returns: An asynchronous .

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.GetAll
member.summary: Gets a result set containing all documents for the entity type from the cache, or via the decorated method if not yet cached. If not already cached, then an index is built and the index and all entities retrieved are cached.
member.returns: An against which further filtering can be applied on the result set.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a single instance of T matching the given Id from the cache, or via the decorated method if not already cached. If not already cached, the entity retrieved is cached.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the entity.
member.returns: An asynchronous containing the entity if found, otherwise null.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.GetNewerVersionIfExists(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for a newer version of an entity in the database if it exists and returns it if found. If found, the newer version is saved to the cache.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the entity.
The presumed most recent version of the entity document.
member.returns: The newer version of the entity if it exists. Otherwise, default(T).

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.Insert(`0)
member.summary: Persists to the repository and to the cache a new document representing the entity by exposing the decorated method.
member.param: The entity to persist to the repository.
member.returns: An asynchronous .

member.name: M:Fursvp.Data.RepositoryWithVersionControl`1.Update(`0)
member.summary: Updates the entity's Version property and, if the versions do not conflict, overwrites the existing document in the repository and in the cache.
member.param: The entity to persist to the repository.
member.returns: An asynchronous .
